metadata.title: CVE-2019-13952 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The set_ipv6() function in zscan_rfc1035.rl in gdnsd before 2.4.3 and 3.xbefore 3.2.1 has a stack-based buffer overflow via a long and malformedIPv6 address in zone data.

criterions.comment: gdnsd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
